ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It ll support 3 groups without necros.  :)  The loot does suck though.  Even Gornit nearby drops better loot.  We killed the boss there a couple times.
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 26 Jan 2000, Naeeldar wrote:
>
> Again why ? I don't care about exp anymore. FYI if it supposts 3 full groups
> of 50's on your server then they are doing something wrong. I can pull and
> solo 1 sea fury non stop. The most it supposts is a two groups if that. The
> loot sucks and guess what they are overcamped now to.

It'll support 3 groups without necros. :) The loot does suck
though. Even Gornit nearby drops better loot. We killed the
boss there a couple times. Got about 2sp average if I recall.

--
John H. Kim
